name: Enslaved: Odyssey to the West
description:
Enslaved: Odyssey to the West is an action-adventure game developed by Ninja Theory. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. On review aggregator Metacritic, Enslaved: Odyssey to the West has a score of 77. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Enslaved: Odyssey to the West is available on PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and PC. You can purchase the game on Xbox 360 Store.
It was scored by Nitin Sawhney.
